page.title: 02EVENTS 1
page.content: {PANTOMIME-}THE PANTOMIME IS HELD IN FEBRUARY. IT IS A TRADITIONAL PANTOMIME PERFORMANCE. {COLLETT DAY-}COLLETT DAY IS HELD IN JUNE. IT IS AN ANNUAL FETE HELD IN THE PARK TO HONOUR THE PERSON WHO GAVE THE PARK TO THE TOWN-JOHN KYTE COLLETT. THERE ARE STALLS,RAFFLES,DISPLAYS,AND CHILDRENS' RACES. {CHILDRENS SHOW-}IT IS HELD IN JUNE. IT IS HELD IN THE CENTRE IN AID OF CHARITY. {SCHOOL BARBEQUE-}IT IS HELD IN JULY AT ST.PAUL'S JUNIOR SCHOOL.IT IS JUST ONE OF MANY EVENTS HELD IN THE SCHOOLS IN SHEPTON. {MEDIEVAL FAIR-}IT IS HELD IN AUGUST ON THE TUESDAY BEFORE THE MID SOMERSET SHOW. {CRICKET CLUB FETE-}IT IS HELD IN AUGUST ON THE CRICKET GROUND FIELD.{ {
